storm-atro.name: Lightning Storm Atronach
storm-atro.description: First boss of AA. The main and the only mechanic is stacking on one of 4 runes when the storm is being casted

sets.why: You get no direct damage from this boss, Kilt will work just fine
You are close to boss and even when there is a rune stacking phase, you still close enough for Zaan proc
Good bleeding DoT with small AoE which works just fine on this standing boss
It's an equal substitution to nirn, and Aegis will stay on boss when you're in the rune
Slayer + good AoE damage

no_sets.why: No damage. And even if you get one, it's hard to stack then

stone-atro.name: Foundation Stone Atronach
stone-atro.description: Second boss of AA. This boss casts The Quake and boulders. On boulders group should gain distance not to stack damage

sets.why: You are close to boss and even when there is an unstacking phase, you still close enough for Zaan proc
There is some trash beside the boss, AoE proc might be useful
Good bleeding DoT with small AoE which works just fine on this standing boss
It's an equal substitution to nirn
Slayer + good AoE damage
You are close to the boss for the whole fight, stacks will work

no_sets.why: Damage received is situational, small chance for proc

varlariel.name: Varlariel
varlariel.description: Third boss of AA. This boss copy herself into 4 clones, each one must be killed - DPS check. If heals and DPS are good - can be ignored

sets.why: You are close to boss for the whole fight, Zaan will always work
Good bleeding DoT with small AoE which works just fine on this standing boss
It's an equal substitution to nirn
Slayer + good AoE damage
You are close to the boss for the whole fight, stacks will work
You don't need stamina for mechanics, feel free to be on 33% or lower

mage.name: The Celestial Mage
mage.description: Last boss of AA. Summons Reflections which should be targeted, Axes which should be taunted. Also spawns Meteors and atronachs on HM. Execute phase is a DPS check

sets.why: There is some trash beside the boss, AoE proc might be useful
Good bleeding DoT with small AoE which works just fine on this standing boss
It's an equal substitution to nirn
Slayer + good AoE damage
You constantly get damage here and basically you don't need to move that much

no_sets.why: You need stamina for execute phase, which will ruin whole parse on Coral
Due to constantly changing targets you will not get enough Relequen stacks working all the time
